1. Town Council

Town Council
============

The Town Council, is a 7-member body elected by the residents of the Town of Northlake.  As a governing body they set laws and regulations for the Town.  Councilmembers represent all residents in the Town, and are elected at-large.  Councilmembers serve for two year terms, while the Mayor is elected for a three year term.

Meetings of the Town Council typically are held on the second and the fourth Thursday of each month  (due to holidays and elections, meeting schedules may differ in some months).

Learn more about the Town Council Priorities  and
Strategic Plan.

Contact Mayor & Town Council
----------------------------

The Mayor & Town Council look forward to receiving any comments or suggestions from residents, businesses, and visitors.
